name: Mushboom
description:
Guide Fukko from a boring city life to his wildest dreams!
Survive the city, collect coins, make him happy and enter his bonus world.

Mushboom is a mixture of classic platformer and endless runner genres.
Start each day in a randomized world, find your way through enemies and obstacles, collect enough coins and run till you wake up.

Fun gameplay in an interactive world with many challenges.
Unique art style with lots of items, tools, characters and more.
100+ missions to accomplish through your journey through different themes.
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
